parameter.name: device
parameter.doc: Device to connect. 0 = USB, 1 = LPT1, 2 = LPT2, ...

parameter.name: ccd
parameter.doc: CCD chip to use. 0 = Imaging, 1 = Tracking.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.doc: Filter to use. Names come from filter device used. (Always will exists a clear one).

parameter.name: exp_time
parameter.doc: Integration time in seconds. Min and max comes from CCDcap.

parameter.name: window
parameter.doc: Sub-window to be readout. x1:y1,x2:y2. $max means the maximun value in the given direction. Math can be used, e.g. $max /2 (half chip)

parameter.name: binning
parameter.doc: Binning mode. Values come from CCDcap.

parameter.name: output
parameter.doc: Filename of the output image (wildcards allowed: $time, $object, $filter).
